case.title: Stressed Out in the City - 25
case.text:
I bring in the bacon, but I'm not getting enough pork. Looking for a "friends-with-benefits" type of situation.
You:
Hygienic, Responsible, Mature, Decent.
Dry, Tall, Attractive.
Stressed is ok (but I don't want to hear about your job and I won't tell you about mine).
Friends first; benefits later; discretion.
No doms or married men.
